# BuiltFast Documentation

> Base URL: https://builtfast.dev
> API Base URL: https://api.builtfast.com

## Documentation
{% assign docs = site.docs | sort: "title" -%}
{% for doc in docs %}
- [{{ doc.title }}](https://builtfast.dev{{ doc.url }}): {{ doc.description | default: doc.title }}
{%- endfor %}

## API Reference

- [API Documentation](https://builtfast.dev/api/): Complete REST API reference with request/response examples
- [OpenAPI Spec](https://builtfast.dev/api/openapi.yaml): Machine-readable API specification

## Resources

- [Blog](https://builtfast.dev/blog/): Product updates and engineering articles
- [Changelog](https://builtfast.dev/changelog/): Release notes and new features
- [Open Source](https://builtfast.dev/oss/): Our open source projects
